meanings.definition: Chief; principal; highest in rank or authority.
meanings.sent1: The archi leader of the tribe made important decisions.
meanings.sent2: She was the archi student in the class, always getting the highest grades.
meanings.sent3: The archi cat in the house thought it ruled over everyone.
meanings.sent4: The archi mountain stood tall and proud, overlooking the entire valley.
meanings.sent5: The archi tree in the forest was so tall, it could be seen from miles away.
